outcome: A rogue malware spreads chaos in Stenograd, causing unprecedented infrastructure failures.

events.description: Stenograd experiences widespread power outages, with neighborhoods left in darkness for hours at a time.
Hospitals report malfunctions in critical patient data systems, delaying treatments and threatening patient safety.
Rogue malware broadcasts panic-inducing messages, further destabilizing public trust in the city's systems.
A remote hack is traced to an external rival city-state, raising suspicions of an orchestrated attack on Stenograd.
